instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.C9560: What is C9560? Tantalum capacitor on 820-2850 logic board that often dies and causes intermittent power to framebuffer PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS and PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS_R rail, causing GPU kernel panics. Replace with non-tantalum if machine is having random black screen or kernel panics.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Random Shutdown and Restarts with grey error message on screen...
threads.message: So i have an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board. Computer shuts down and restarts when i run valley bench marking tool while on battery.. On the power cord issue takes alot longer to happen but does happen alot more rare.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Random Shutdown and Restarts with grey error message on screen...
threads.message: <CAPACITOR>C9560</CAPACITOR> has nothing to do with the backlight. No idea what is going on. Is there even a picture? Fuse blown? Short on backlight rails? Damaged connector/cable?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Random Shutdown and Restarts with grey error message on screen...
threads.message: Sry duke let me clear this up. The unit originally worked fine.. In valley the 3d benchmarking software. The computer would just shut off out of now where.... You guys told me to replace <CAPACITOR>C9560</CAPACITOR>... i tried that when i reassembled the unit had no back light. Im not sure if its relevant but maybe i installed the wrong kind of capacitor... or i messed something up while reassembling the unit? Eitherway i tried troubleshooting this but i dont know where to start the issue now is i have no backlight. I tryed a new lcd no dice.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Random Shutdown and Restarts with grey error message on screen...
threads.message: I understood all of that. Did you understand my post? All questions are there.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Random Shutdown and Restarts with grey error message on screen...
threads.message: I see. Yup mis understood. There is a picture its just the backlight. I will troubleshoot the backlight rails and post some voltages soon enough.
